Keywords: Avengers , Brute , Dark Avengers , Horsemen
Real Name: Robert Reynolds
Special Powers
(+5 POINTS) VOID: When Sentry would be KO'd, you may instead replace him with an Avengers Forever #053b Sentry on click #7. That character gains Immune until your next turn even if lost. Protected: Pulse Wave.
UNSTABLE: When Sentry is targeted by Mind Control, modify his defense -2.
ERASED MYSELF FROM EVERYONE'S MINDS: Charge, Stealth.
SHARE MY POWER: Perplex, but only to target other friendly characters. When Sentry uses it, choose one for the targeted character to use until your next turn:
*Charge
*Invulnerability.
Figure Errata
Changed (+5 POINTS) VOID
Trade Sentry Want Sentry

Comments
December 11, 2022
tidge
This doesn't strike me as a particularly potent dial (in the 2022 era) for the cost but I admire the simplicity, even with my "meh" attitude to Super Strength (and object use) under the current rules. I do think that this dial evokes the character with not just its peculiar weakness to Mind Control but also its mundane weakness to Outwit. I even find the SHARE MY POWER to be a good reason to not immediately toss this figure into the fray, which is something that feels comic-accurate to me. Adding +5 points for the VOID seals the deal as far as I am concerned, otherwise there are probably better options for most teams.
December 8, 2022
hoojeebo
They issued an errata about it. The point costs on the card are correct.
December 7, 2022
Oathful
The one I have seems to be printed correct Bane. In general the card supersedes the dial, but I get why you're upset about that. However, think of it this way, that misprint will be worth a lot more later down the line!
December 7, 2022
Bane of the Demon
So what's the deal w this fig? Realms says 115, Card says 115 and 50 point dial, fig says 125 (!) and 50 point dial... Wizkids, please step up your game, this is embarrassing...
November 14, 2022
SuperClixer
Glad to see a Sentry in classic costume with the Avengers TA, but I wish he was more powerful and higher points in this costume.
October 24, 2022
Oathful
I'm going to wait before I do a full review on this guy, but right now for 115 points he looks great, giving out Charge or Invulnerable means you can enable a lot of characters that have good powers to become even better secondary attackers for him. My first thoughts are all the brutes that could use Charge when they land on a Flurry click, or Invulnerable to their non-reducer defense power. Depending on how his Void version looks will really cement whether he's a really good home piece or if he'll be meta.
